ygData.subject: Re: Off Topic
ygData.msgSnippet: Another fact of life, for some reason wood elves like high elves better than their own kin ie higher faction as well as charisma.  This is probably a bug, and
ygData.messageBody:
Another fact of life, for some reason wood elves like high elves better than
their own kin ie higher faction as well as charisma. This is probably a
bug, and might get changed.

-----Original Message-----
From: Vincent Archer [mailto:Vincent.Archer@...]
Sent: Friday, May 07, 1999 8:19 AM
To: _EQ_Magic@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [_EQ_Magic] Off Topic


From: Vincent Archer <Vincent.Archer@...>

According to Robert Lejeune:
> We call this charisma, High Elf have higher charisma so they have stuff
for
> less silver =()

Well, now I know why I like high elves... I have a gnome necromancer friend,
and his 8th level spells were about 4pp (oh, the grumbling). Well, I tought
this odd, as mine were about 17gp each...

(the same scrolls are over 2pp in Freeport)
